metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17529 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in AP4_CencSampleEncryption::DoInspectFields in Core/Ap4CommonEncryption.cpp when called from AP4_Atom::Inspect in Core/Ap4Atom.cpp.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
